name: In re Charles E. STOCKMAN. Appeal of Charles E. STOCKMAN

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO, and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: In re Charles E. STOCKMAN. Appeal of Charles E. STOCKMAN.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: George C. Entenmann, Murray, O’Neill & Tumolo, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Alexander J. Jaffurs, County Sol., James A. Esler, Charles T. Pankow, Asst. Sols., Cheryl Allen Craig, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
393 A.2d 435
In re Charles E. STOCKMAN. Appeal of Charles E. STOCKMAN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 25, 1978.
Decided Oct. 16, 1978.
George C. Entenmann, Murray, O’Neill & Tumolo, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Alexander J. Jaffurs, County Sol., James A. Esler, Charles T. Pankow, Asst. Sols., Cheryl Allen Craig, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO, and LARSEN, JJ.
